/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.title: home-assistant helm release
/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.name: home-assistant
/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn

0:
until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Awaiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

[kubernetes]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  desc = "Tripp Lite 1500VA SmartUPS"
  vendorid = "09AE"
  productid = "2012"

MONITOR kubernetes@localhost:3493 1 upsmon secret primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

[upsmon]
  password  = secret
  upsmon primary
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
